about_the_game:
This DLC decensors content from the base game of Tomboys Need Love Too, without the need to download an external patch.

This is bundled separately from the main game so that TNLT will remain visible to players who haven't opted-in to see 18+ sexual content.
detailed_description:
This DLC decensors content from the base game of Tomboys Need Love Too, without the need to download an external patch.

This is bundled separately from the main game so that TNLT will remain visible to players who haven't opted-in to see 18+ sexual content.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 15 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.4
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 15 MB available space

name: Tomboys Need Love Too! 18+ Patch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 15 MB available space

short_description: 18+ content patch for Tomboys Need Love Too!
supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Latin America, Simplified Chinese
